title: The Boys Return From Tabacalera Perdomo
itunes:title: The Boys Return From Tabacalera Perdomo
description:
The band is back together this week as David Garofalo and Mr. Jonathan return from their trip to Nicaragua and the Perdomo factory.

Rumour has it that Mr. J is going to get outed on the show, and Barry gets his grades from the boss on his job hosting the show last week.

In the first hour we will light up a Brick House cigar from the care package and a Perdomo Habano BBA in the second hour.

Join us for the madness known as The Cigar Authority.
